labels.name: P4, unlikely to ever be fixed.

data.actual_result: It overfills the red notification icon.
data.expected_result: The count inside of the red notification icon should stay inside.
data.short_description: Numbers from notification icon overfills when exceeded to 100 and beyond (2160x1080 screen specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Let someone mention you in a server. - Observe the mention count and the red bubble when it reached at 100 and over
